detectors.description: Lotto.calculateWinner(uint256,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#47-70) uses a weak PRNG: "winningTicketIndex = decisionBlockHash % rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#57)"
Lotto.fallback() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#131-160) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#141)
Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#89-113) ignores return value by winner.send(subpot) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#109)

Deprecated standard detected uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex)) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#116):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex))](shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L116):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description: solc-0.4.11 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#89-113):
	External calls:
	- winner.send(subpot) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#109)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].isCashed[subpotIndex] = true (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#111)

Reentrancy in [Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256)](shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L89-L113):
	External calls:
	- [winner.send(subpot)](shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L109)
	State variables written after the call(s):

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#131-160):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#141)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#146)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#149)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#150)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#153)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#154)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#157)

	- [rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount](shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L154)
	- [rounds[roundIndex].pot += value](shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L157)
